subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ victory Wednesday gave them their first season series win over the Yankees since 2008, and put them on the verge of their first Subway Series sweep since interleague play began in 1997.
snippet: The Mets’ victory Wednesday gave them their first season series win over the Yankees since 2008, and put them on the verge of their first Subway Series sweep since interleague play began in 1997.
